plot: Dressed as Santa, recently divorced Gregor tries to surprise his son with a present, but he is stopped by his ex, Susan.
title: Gregor's Nacht
plot_es: Dressed as Santa, recently divorced Gregor tries to surprise his son with a present, but he is stopped by his ex, Susan.
plot_en: Dressed as Santa, recently divorced Gregor tries to surprise his son with a present, but he is stopped by his ex, Susan.
